TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataListDesigner Inherits TemplatedControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider, IDataSourceProvider

summary.span: 为组件提供一个基类，该组件在设计器宿主中为 类派生的 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器主机中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，描述控件的标记源代码派生自抽象类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当用户切换回源视图时，设计时控件持久保存到标记的源代码，并编辑向网页上的标记。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 抽象类用作基类的派生自的控件提供设计时支持的组件设计器宿主中。The abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 类属性提供了以下功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - ， ， ，和属性提供对关联控件的相应属性的访问。The , , , and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control. - 属性提供对该设计器关联的控件的数据源的访问权限。The property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control. 属性获取数据源的默认视图。The property gets the default view of the data source. 类方法提供以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的组件。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法调用控件的组件编辑器。The method invokes a component editor for the control. 方法用于添加、 删除或隐藏关联控件的设计时属性。The method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control. - 方法生成一个可以在设计时使用作为数据源的对象。The method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time. 方法获取的数据源从关联控件的容器。The method gets the data source from the container of the associated control. 方法获取从控件容器中解析为的特定数据成员的数据源。The method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member. 方法获取的数据源的模板容器。The method gets the data source of the template container. - 到关联的控件的更改时调用方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 关联的控件的数据源已更改时调用方法。The method is called when the associated control data source has changed. 关联的控件的数据源的架构更改时进行调用的方法。The method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes. 已应用的自动格式设置方案时，调用方法。The method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied. - 和可以重写方法，以实现应发生当关联的控件样式发生更改时也可以在设计器的模板编辑谓词已发生更改，分别的功能。The and methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively. 方法可处理属性生成器事件。The method handles the property-builder event.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类创建派生自的关联的控件时类或该控件的设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置设计器的属性会导致要设置的关联控件的属性。Setting the designer's property causes the property of the associated control to be set. 如果设置为，，该值指示新的数据源的定义，**创建数据源**对话框随即显示。If the is set to a , indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed. 如果设置为，该值指示没有任何数据源，设置为空字符串 ("")。If the is set to a indicating there is no data source, the is set to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取通过传递绑定到关联的控件的数据源的默认视图属性方法对象。The property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the property to the method of the object. 如果不返回任何视图，或未设置属性，方法用于获取视图名称和第一个视图名称用于获取默认视图。If no view is returned or the property is not set, the method of the is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.

span.span: A control derived from the , which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主调用方法准备好使用设计器来呈现派生自该控件时类。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the class. 方法和其基方法配置属性，并连接到所需的设计器操作的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. 连接到设计时数据源和更新的设计时标记。The connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup. 如果属性实现接口，连接， ，和事件。If the property implements the interface, the connects the , , and events. `component`参数是控件，派生自，即与此设计器中或一份该控件关联。The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the , that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

A对象定义应用于控件的对象。A object defines a object that is applied to the control. 设计器可以重写要检查控件的属性，或采取某种其他操作。A designer can override the to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.

summary.span: 当关联的控件更改时调用。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用时派生自的控件的事件类执行。The method is called when the event of a control that is derived from the class executes. 通常，这是为了响应在控件上的属性更改 (例如，**属性**网格更改)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果控件绑定到的对象发生更改时，控件重绘设计图面上。If the object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基方法连接关联的控件派生自类到当前的数据源，方法是从连接控件的数据源不同，如果更新的设计时标记。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非设计器处于模板编辑模式或字段是正在添加或编辑，方法调用方法，后者反过来调用方法来更新控件以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

span.span: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可实现来执行其他处理，例如录制发生了更改，当模板编辑谓词更改时。The method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.

para.span: 方法是抽象的必须在派生的类继承自时重写类。

span.span: The method is abstract and must be overridden when a derived class inherits from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现已添加和隐藏属性的 接口的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing an interface of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自的方法方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加到属性或删除属性从**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 派生自的控件类，创建设计时属性，以隐藏， ， ，和属性。For controls that are derived from the class, the creates design-time properties to shadow the , , , and properties.

para.span: 重写方法可以将属性添加到或更改的设计时属性集合中的属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
